content: **attention sept 15th 2021 the french part 2 is replaced due to an error on page 4 and on page 6 thanks imene kallel our new member of the french translating team for spotting them ** **attention for all parts 7 jan 17th 2022 the total of the single_crochet ch3 single_crochet in round 64 has to be 38 instead of 39 ** **attention for all parts 8 decrease 4th 2021 an error has been spotted by tania leis thank you dear round 71 on the short side in the us english part this is on page 48 the first repeat of a group of stitches should be ch1 double_crochet in the next ch1-space 4x not 5x ** **attention for part 10 just in the english uk version* due to an error on round 81 page 40 i have deleted the old anno part 10 in one line fptr was written instead of fpdtr ** **in part 12 round 88 the total of the ch2-space on the short side has to be 42 not 43 ** **attention just part 14 dutch due to an error in part 14 most hstal has to be hst i have uploaded the whole part 14 dutch anew on 7th march 2022 ** **12 march 2022 only part 9 french translation due to an error in round 72 page 9 just before - coquille 7- i downloaded a new part 9 french i have thrown away the old part 9 french ** the cal for anno 1926 will start on september 2nd 2021 in my facebook group haaksteek https //www facebook com/groups/383731435363230 it is divided into 17 parts from the 2nd part on every next part will be released bi-weekly the pattern will be available in 14 languages afrikaans danish dutch english uk terms english us terms finnish french german hebrew indonesian italian portuguese spanish urdu it is a challenging pattern with lots of special figures and stitches it requires concentration and accurate reading of the descriptions however the descriptions are very detailed with lots of pictures and wonderful tania leis makes a video for every part as support my childhood memories are the template for this huge blanket with dk yarn and hook size 4 5 my blanket is 240 x 180 cm heidrun liegmann made her wonderful anno in fingering yarn and hook size 3 5 mm her blanket is 140 x 100 cm my haaksteek team and i have worked on this blanket for many many months i would be nothing without the help of these wonderful people who worked so hard and put a lot of time energy and love into this project to make it to its best for all of you great tiny woman my mom i dedicate this cal to her by naming the blanket after the year of her birth anno 1926 weaving my precious and cherished childhood memories into anno makes it so special i hope you ll have as much pleasure in making your own anno
